basics.name: Gabriela Surita
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Hi! I'm Gabriela Surita. I'm a senior year computer engineering student at University of Campinas and certified part time software developer. My best skill is to be able to combine practical, self-taught, and quick hacking solutions with software engineering and technical knowledge.

work.summary: Spaço is a local advertisement company focused on Web solutions for small businesses.
3E Unicamp is a Junior enterprise that provides consulting services from teachers and skilled students on the fields of Electrical and Computer Engineering.
highlights: Build websites by contract using Django, Javascript and CSS.

work.summary: Mesonn Instruments is a startup that produces digital measuring instruments for synchrotron laboratories and general purposes.
highlights: Using embedded Linux and implementing network protocols in C/C++.

volunteer.summary: Global movement to teach and encourage women to follow careers in computer science.
highlights: Taught computer science introduction and machine learning courses with Python.

publications.name: Open Source Platform for digital Simulation of Delay Based PUFs
publications.publisher: Proceedings of the 18th Undergraduate Scientific Research Congress of Unicamp
publications.summary: Propose and evaluate a digital simulation model for Physical Unclonable Functions hardware security primitives.

publications.name: Cylindrical Reconvergence PUF
publications.publisher: Proceedings of the 19th Euromicro Symposium on Digital Systems Design
publications.summary: Propose a new architecture of Physical Unclonable Function that shows a better trade-off between hardware footprint and resistance to machine learning modelling attacks.
